title: Jeffrey Epstein Investigation Expands to High-Profile Figures
description: Congressional investigation into Jeffrey Epstein connections reaches prominent political and business leaders, with testimony and resignations occurring
arc: House Oversight Committee investigation into Jeffrey Epstein has escalated to include testimony from Hillary Clinton, with proceedings temporarily disrupted by leaked photos.
